import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • {props.home}
  • {props.aboutUs}
) } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, home: PropTypes.string, aboutUs: PropTypes.string, } Navbar.defaultProps = { title: "Angular", home: "Home", anoutus: "About Us" }
